amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part B of House Report 116-334 to clarify that federal employee health plans are covered by the price reduction provisions of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part B of House Report 116-334 to clarify that federal employee health plans are covered by the price reduction provisions of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Luria amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 231 - 192 (Roll no. 679).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mrs. Luria.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Luria amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 231 - 192 (Roll no. 679).
